attributes.action: To make the benifit system a helping hand not a live style
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The benifit system should be more basic. It is there to help people out who have fallen on bad times. It is not a live style or a system that should encourage people to stay on it or want to be on it. It should be a voucher scheme not free money to buy fags and booze with my hard earned cash. Basic food groups, basic housing, basic benifit system
